option_pane.full_log: - The process *#pname#* was consuming *~#avgconsume#* of CPU processing power.\n{noformat}\n#logfull#{noformat}
option_pane.screen_off: - The process *#pname#* was consuming *~#scoffconsume#* of CPU processing power while screen was off.\n{noformat}\n#logoff#{noformat}
option_pane.screen_on: - The process *#pname#* was consuming *~#sconconsume#* of CPU processing power while screen was on.\n{noformat}\n#logon#{noformat}
option_pane.high_current: - High current while screen is off:
option_pane.suspicious: - *#pname#* causes tag *#tag#* to acquire and hold PowerManagerService.Wakelock for #duration# draining battery life.\n{noformat}\n#log#{noformat}
option_pane.alarms: - The process *#pname#* is triggering too many alarm wake-ups.\n{panel}\n#log#{panel}
option_pane.tether: - The user is *tethering a Wifi* network. Thus, this CR can be considered invalid for current drain analysis.
